    public class SpecificationMongoRepository<T,​ID>
extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.support.SimpleMongoRepository<T,​ID>

    The mongo repository implementation with specification executor.

      long count​(ISpecification<T> spec)

      java.util.Optional<T> findOne​(ISpecification<T> spec)
      Returns a single entity matching the given ISpecification or Optional.empty() if none found.
